NPSSR: Analysis for Becker 2016 Reward S:
The Becker 2016 Reward dataset evaluates the effect of reward on pain. Reward will 
Be one of the conditions we examine in this NPS + Self-Regulation Analysis
Associated_publications: Becker, S., et al., Orbitofrontal cortex mediates pain inhibition by monetary reward. Social Cognitive and Affective Neuroscience, 2016.
Notes: This dataset was shared with Tor by Susanne Becker
